Facilitating Hazard Mitigation Projects Act
Facilitating Hazard Mitigation Projects Act

A bill to require the Administrator of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to conduct an evaluation and submit to Congress a report on ways to reduce the complexity of the cost effectiveness requirements for hazard mitigation assistance, and for other purposes.
